skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Tribal-class Destroyer Eskimo! During the war, I mostly served in the Home Fleet. I defeated Z19 at the Battle of Narvik, but then Z2 struck back at me... After that, I did good work in the Mediterranean.
skins.acquisition: Eskimo, Tribal-class Destroyer, is here! Oi, this fleet's not half bad! Nice to meet you, Commander!
skins.login: Commander, you kept me waiting so long I got mad and took apart your chair! Wh-what if I can't put it back together...?
skins.details: I was just looking for you, Commander! Let's do something fun.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, let's build an igloo when it snows! I'm pretty good at those!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yippeeee! Yahoooo! Ah, Commander, errr~ Why am I horsing around like this? Just bored, I guess.
skins.secretaryIdle3: All right, target acquired: daydreaming Commander. Eskimo head smasher! GO!
skins.secretaryTouch: What's up, Commander? Time I get to work? All right, time I get to work!

skins.shipDescription: Oh woe, nobody wants to play with me because they're all too busy~ ...Oh, hello little Manjuu... Heheh, maybe I'll play a prank on you instead!
skins.acquisition: Oh woe, nobody wants to play with me because they're all too busy~ ...Oh, hello little Manjuu... Heheh, maybe I'll play a prank on you instead!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ehehe... You have no choice but to play with me! ...Commander! Oh, it's nothing!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Miss Belfast and Dunkerque? You brought ice cream for me? Thanks a ton! Ah, got any for the Manjuu? Huh, what do you mean you're not falling for that?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you done with work yet? You're not? Aw, I wanted to play...
skins.secretaryTouch: Oww! All right, please stop bonking me... I just got bored because you wouldn't play with me... Okay, okay, I won't bully the Manjuu anymore...
